title: why the ranked 20 champs requirement is stupid
body:
who will fkin ban or pick all my 10 champs with 2% pickrate/banrate in champ select in one game

the situation is impossible? just give me a dodge if they are all picked
I'll die for a game of ranked in NA but i have to grind for fkin champions first

what about one tricks and people who main 3 champs they too have to grind for 17 placeholders and 3 actual champions
